text_block_list.text:
Boop boop. 
Boop beep boop boop. 
Beep boop beep beep.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
"DEON" is『Zenno Rob Roy』. 
"Downlink", "downlink"――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Boop boop. 
Boop beep boop boop. 
Beep boop beep beep.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
――"FOBN"......"Communication" failed. 
――...However.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: ――"PYSC" may be "viable"?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Event logo.
Huff... huff... huff...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――Phew. 
...Oh... the cosmos flowers are already in bloom...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: (Autumn is finally here. ...And with it, its GIs.)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(In spring―― I took to the grand GI stage, hoping to win. 
...But victory was beyond my grasp.)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(I couldn't live up to the mighty achievements of my forebearers. 
And those succeeding me are blessed with incredible talent―― 
Blinding brilliance threatens to envelop me from all directions.)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: (I'm still a far cry from the "hero" I hope to become...)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
But... That's exactly why I need to accomplish something this 
autumn. I need to take the Autumn Senior Triple Crown――!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: That's it—pick up the pace! Try and keep up!　――Faster, Rob Roy!
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ! Yaaaaahhhh!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Do another lap――One more time, Rob Roy.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Your goal today―― Is to be within 0.1 seconds of the best time. ――Ensure it.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
...Right! 
I'm sorry... Let's try one more time...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――Let us take―― A short break. 
――Rest. Then we run.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Right, sorry, I'll be ready again soon...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: (...I need to work harder!)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Okay... that should do it. We've got enough picnic blankets for 
the moon viewing. Now I need get the dango ingredients――
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
――Oh, hey there, Universe. 
You look a little puzzled. Something on your mind?
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
"WORR" has been "detected". 
...Fuji Kiseki is "transporting". Is this a mission?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Oh, all this? It's for the Moon Viewing Social. Just taking it out of storage.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text: Oh! The Moon Viewing Social! Already that time of year, huh! Are ya in charge this time, Fuji-san?
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: 『Moon Viewing』...?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
I guess you haven't been to it before, Universe? 
We hold this event around this time every year to let students 
get together and socialize.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
We're coming up on the fall race season, right? Everyone's got 
their own goals for fall, so the Social gives them the chance to 
lend each other their support. That's the general idea.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text: Girls who debuted, girls who ain't, senpai, kouhai, everybody gets together to train! It's a real good time!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: And the moon viewing after training is amazing!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Everyone gets to eat outta the same pot and chew the chat! 
We talk a lot about our goals and cheer each other on for future 
races!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
There's also a tradition of giving each other shoe care tools. 
Racers like us get a lot of use out of those tools, so they're 
really important gifts.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
"I want to encourage you," "I want to support you", "let's both 
do our best...". That's what the gift of a tool can tell someone. 
It can mean a lot for our racing endeavors.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text: Dober and I exchanged gifts!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Short and mile for me, middle distances for Dober. 
"So let's both do our best and win the races we're aiming for!" 
Y'know?
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Getting cheered on by everyone really motivated us! 
Thanks to all their encouragement, we got out GI wins!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: 『Moon Viewing』... 『Mutual support』... Autumn race season...
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
...Sigh. 
I couldn't make time today either.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(I went as far as to ask her to train me personally, even knowing 
it was unreasonable... The way I am now, I'm only causing 
trouble for Kris S-san...)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――Hey, it's almost time for the Moon Viewing Social, isn't it? 
You think we should go? I know you want to do your best this 
fall.
text_block_list.name: Umamusume A

text_block_list.text:
For sure. It's like, a real morale boost, and I'm hoping to learn 
a thing or two from our senpai, you know? 
So, yeah, let's go! Together!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume B

text_block_list.text: Oh... That's right, there's going to be a social...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(It's a large group training, then a dinner party, if I remember 
correctly... Everyone is doing so much to prepare for the autumn 
season...)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(I wonder... I wonder if I can improve enough. 
Can I reach my goal before the season starts...?)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(――I can't think like that. I can do it, I know I will. 
I won't let Kris S-san's help go to waste...!)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Zenno Rob Roy's current "mode": "REVS". 
Acknowledging "aid" as "MORT". 
"Code":  『Moon Viewing』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: ――Mission, "liftoff".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
